system.sustained:
Psyker fires a 30 Degree Cone similar to a weapon with the Spray Quality. Those within the area opposed the Focus Power Test with their Agility, any that fail take 2d10+Psy Rating Energy Damage with Felling v(2), Tainted, and Warp Weapon Qualities, Plus additional Quality determined by Psyker's Chaos Alignment: Tzeentch: Flame, Slaanesh: Shocking, Nurgle: Toxic, Unaligned: Tearing. (No Khorne, he hates Psykers).
If this power causes Psychic Phenomena, in addition to normal effects until the start of the Psyker's next turn all creatures within 3d10 metres of the psyker suffer -10 to all Willpower Tests 
Felling v(X): Reduce Unnatural Toughness by X, Tainted: Add Psyker's Corruption Bonus to Damage, Warp Weapon: Ignore Cover and Non-Warded Armour AP.
